item.title: Stephanie Leavell - I Love Halloween - Baritone Ukulele - Key of Em
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for DGBE ukulele. Key of Em.
Chords Used: C, B7, Em, G
As performed by Stephanie Leavell at musicforkiddos.com.
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/myBtxt6Hg7s
******************** Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion.
Check out the UkeStuff Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Radio Public, Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher. If you don't have a podcast app, please check out Radio Public for all your podcasts--they support podcasters financially.
You are invited to visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (a free resource). Also on social media: Twitter (@UkeStuff) and Instagram (@ukestuff.info)
Check out the "merch": https://teespring.com/stores/ukestuff
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: Stephanie Leavell - Shy Little Monster - Key of C
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of C.
Chords Used: C, E7, F, G
As performed by Stephanie Leavell at musicforkiddos.com. A book package is available!
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/mSpOYsBAb5Y
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com. Video from motionbolt.com.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play alongs at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6
We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!
Interested in UkeStuff merchandise? https://teespring.com/stores/ukestuff
Check out the UkeStuff Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Radio Public, Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher. If you don't have a podcast app, please check out Radio Public for all your podcasts--they support podcasters financially.
You are invited to visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (a free resource).
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: Kim Mitzo Thompson - Little Black Things - Key of F
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of F (Original Key)
As performed by Kim Mitzo Thompson
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts and Google Play.
Are these ukulele resources valuable to you? If so, consider following my blog at ukestuff.info, and becoming a patron at www.patreon.com/cjrphd. There is a master list of all similar play along videos at ukestuff.info.

item.title: Karen Mitzo Hilderbrand - Oh My Monster, Frankenstein - Key of F
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of F.
As performed by Kim Mitzo Thompson. Modified to two chords: F & C7.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts and Google Play.

item.title: Zombies Just Want to Be Loved Ukulele Play Along - Key of C
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of C. (Raised 80 cents from the original audio).
As performed by Bryant Oden. Used with permission! See his work at songdrops.com, and also subscribe to his YouTube channel (https://www.youtube.com/user/songdrops).
My local ukulele group had a Halloween-themed play along yesterday, and someone had this song. I knew I had to make it into a Play Along. Watch for some other play alongs from SongDrops in the future.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts and Google Play.
Are these ukulele resources valuable to you? If so, consider following my blog at ukestuff.info, and becoming a patron at www.patreon.com/cjrphd. There is a master list of all similar play along videos at ukestuff.info.

item.title: Bobby "Boris" Pickett and Cryptkickers - Monster Mash - Baritone Ukulele - Key of G
item.description:
